original_text: Shall not the land tremble for this, and every one mourn that dwelleth therein? and it shall rise up wholly as a flood; and it shall be cast out and drowned, as by the flood of Egypt.
korean_text: 이로 말미암아 땅이 떨지 않겠으며 그 가운데 모든 주민이 애통하지 않겠느냐 온 땅이 강의 넘침 같이 솟아오르며 애굽 강 같이 뛰놀다가 낮아지리라

sentences.original_text: Shall not the land tremble for this?
and every one mourn that dwelleth therein?
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 거하는 모든 자가 슬퍼하지 않겠는가?

sentences.original_text: and it shall rise up wholly as a flood;
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 마치 홍수처럼 온전히 일어날 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and it shall be cast out and drowned,
as by the flood of Egypt.
